title: Product list item
description: The product list item represents a product selected by a customer with specific options, pricing, usage context for a specific point of time and may differ from the product record. For example the product record contains details from the product information system that are consistent for all customers, where the product list item has the actual price offered to the customer at that time which may vary due to sales campaigns or seasonal pricing.

xdm:SKU.title: SKU
xdm:SKU.description: Stock keeping unit (SKU), the unique identifier for a product defined by the vendor.

@id.title: Line item ID.
@id.description: The line item identifier for this product entry. The product itself is identified through `xdm:product`.

xdm:product.title: Product
xdm:product.description: The XDM identifier of the product itself.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: The display name for the product as presented to the user for this product view.

xdm:productAddMethod.title: Product add method
xdm:productAddMethod.description: The method that was used to add a product item to the list by the visitor. Set with product list add metrics.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency code
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 alphabetic currency code used for pricing the product.

xdm:quantity.title: Quantity
xdm:quantity.description: The number of units the customer has indicated they require of the product.

xdm:priceTotal.title: Price total
xdm:priceTotal.description: The total price for the product line item.

xdm:itemsInProductList.title: Items in Product List
xdm:itemsInProductList.description: An array of all product IDs/SKUs in the list of products. Used outside of a shopping cart.

xdm:productImpression.title: Product Impression
xdm:productImpression.description: Counted any time a product thumbnail or summary view has been displayed, aside from the product detail page itself or as an item in a cart.

xdm:skuVariant.title: Product SKU Variant
xdm:skuVariant.description: Tracks if a product has alternate SKUs or IDs, such as different SKUs for color variants.

xdm:brand.title: Product Brand
xdm:brand.description: Tracks the brand of the individual product.

xdm:inventory.title: Product Inventory Count
xdm:inventory.description: Tracks the current inventory for the individual product.

xdm:productType.title: Product Type
xdm:productType.description: The total price for the product line item.

xdm:listPrice.title: Product List Price
xdm:listPrice.description: Tracks the wholesale/list price for an individual product.

xdm:taxAmount.title: Order Taxes
xdm:taxAmount.description: Tracks the total amount of taxes applied to a successful order.

xdm:thumbnailUrl.title: Product Thumbnail URL
xdm:thumbnailUrl.description: Tracks the URL for the product thumbnail, when displayed.

xdm:productListPosition.title: Product List Position
xdm:productListPosition.description: Captures the position of the product item in a list of products.
